content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, it's indeed a pleasure to introduce our centrally located apartment in Magdeburg to you. To begin our discussion on the rental price, I have in mind an initial figure of 1250 Euros per month. However, I'm open to negotiation and exploring mutually beneficial terms. Do let me know your proposed price so we can proceed with our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Herr Schmidt. Considering the location and size of the apartment, I think 800 euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I regretfully find your offer insufficient given the value and desirability of this property, Mr. Wang. As a landlord, I'm focused on maximizing my returns, and 1250 Euros remains my minimum acceptable price. I hope you understand my position and consider revising your proposal. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
